title: Nice accommodation closeby to Pere Lachaise
body:
QR Code Link to This Post


Central and bright apartment with one room in the heart of the 20th district of Paris. Trendy and popular, Père Lachaise Ménilmontant is a place full of charm allowing its visitors to discover Paris during their stay in this accommodation which we can accommodate 2 travelers. You will be near a lot of bars, restaurants, shops and various tourists sites like the cemetery of Père Lachaise or the Belleville park.

The appartment is fully furnished, with wifi and the monthly price includes all the fees. Metro station Alexandre Dumas line 2, is 50 m away.  Bus line 76 will take you to Bastille and in the very heart of Paris.

The rent has to be paid in advance in cash, and I ask for one month securit deposit on bank account that will be given back at the end of the location.

Availabilities dates are september 11 to december 9.
This price applies for monthly rent only.
Don't hesitate to contact me for more informations !
